alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:24AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Dickinson, northwestern Delta, northern Menominee, southeastern Marquette and southwestern Alger Counties through 715 AM EDT/615 AM CDT/... At 624 AM EDT/524 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Ishpeming to near Watson to near Pembine. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marquette, Escanaba, Ishpeming, Presque Isle, Negaunee, Watson, Rapid River, Powers, Chatham, Trenary, La Branche, K. I. Sawyer Airport, Rock, K I Sawyer, Trowbridge Park, U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, Deerton, West Ishpeming, Hermansville and Harvey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
